TaxCollectorSpecialText.Graveyard1: Death and taxes, nothing more sure in life than that!
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Graveyard2: The people here aren't paying up! They are better off dead! Oh, perhaps they already are.
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Rain1: Humbug! Someone tried to tell me they saw a fish walking on land. Who do they take ME for?!
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Rain2: Why can't it be raining gold coins!? Water is everywhere! Bah, how useless!
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Storm1: A marvelous storm! A remarkable storm!
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Storm2: I am as giddy as a drunken man! I love this weather!
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Windy1: Just because your house blows down, doesn't mean you stop paying taxes!
TaxCollectorSpecialText.Windy2: Bah! If this wind keeps up, people will lose their precious possessions and stop paying me!

TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.Content: What? I AM in a good mood.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.DislikeBiome: What kind of irritating place is {BiomeName}? Poppycock, I tell you!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.DislikeCrowded: I'll have you know, I dislike neighbors!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.DislikeNPC: {NPCName} is just too noisy, away with them and their ilk!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.FarFromHome: Bah! I'm trying to make my way back home to count my money. Begone!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.HateBiome: Even for my standard, {BiomeName} is beyond miserable! Bah!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.HateCrowded: Go tell all these miserable poor freeloaders to scram, I hate crowds.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.HateNPC: I loathe the very existence of {NPCName}! What kind of lunatic just gives things away for free?
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LikeBiome: Living in {BiomeName} forces people to stay indoors and leave me alone. I find that pleasant.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LikeNPC: Exuberant people tend to give me a headache, but somehow I actually like {NPCName}. I must be losing my mind!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LikeNPC_Princess: {NPCName} shouldn't pay taxes, she's the princess... but she insisted.
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LoveNPC: I highly admire {NPCName}. Anyone who knows the true value of money earns my utmost respect!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.LoveSpace: Finally, isolation from all these miserable peasants!
TownNPCMood_TaxCollector.NoHome: How can a man of my riches have no home? Preposterous!
